rules: Overlines/Labels must be Uppercase + tracking-widest + text-xs
Line height: tight for headers, relaxed for body

container_rules: Containers with borders must have internal padding (p-6 or p-8)

shadcn_customization.Card: Flat background, 1px subtle border (border-slate-200), no shadow by default. Hover: shadow-lg, -translate-y-1 transition-all duration-300
shadcn_customization.Button: Sharp edges or small radius (rounded-md). Primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800. Secondary: border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50
shadcn_customization.Table: Clean, minimal. Header: bg-slate-50 text-slate-500 uppercase text-xs tracking-wider. Rows: hover:bg-slate-50/50 transition-colors

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Configure 'tailwind.config.js' with the specified colors and fonts. Add 'Plus Jakarta Sans' and 'DM Sans' via Google Fonts in 'index.html'.
3. LAYOUT: Create a 'DashboardLayout' component with a sidebar (collapsible on mobile) and a top header.
4. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components in 'components/ui' to match the 'Flat & Clean' aesthetic defined in 'components' section.
6. DATA: Mock data for charts and tables initially, but structure it to be easily replaced by API calls.
7. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid generic 'AI slop' aesthetics. Be bold with spacing and typography.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for overlays.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters for icons.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures and noise overlays separate good from extraordinary.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui.
